languages.text: "Вог, первый Восход — вплетен в гобелен твоей судьбы. Хайг, второй Восход — вступил в чертоги, разверстые для Предела рассвета. Имя чемпиона славят смертные словно восходящего бога. Рукоположение свершено — сосуд исполнен благости и готов принять волю Ткача".

"Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."
languages.original_text: "Вог, первый Восход — вплетен в гобелен твоей судьбы. Хайг, второй Восход — вступил в чертоги, разверстые для Предела рассвета. Имя чемпиона славят смертные словно восходящего бога. Рукоположение свершено — сосуд исполнен благости и готов принять волю Ткача".

The champion's name is praised by mortals like a name of a rising god. The ordination is done: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

languages.text: “沃格，第一黎明，已编织成你们命运的绣帷。希杰，第二黎明，已进入破晓锋刃降临的殿堂。勇士之名被凡人赞颂，如同恰在升格的神明。授勋仪式已经完成——容器已受到祝福，足以接受命运编织者的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

traits.locale_text: “沃格，第一黎明，已编织成你们命运的绣帷。希杰，第二黎明，已进入破晓锋刃降临的殿堂。勇士之名被凡人赞颂，如同恰在升格的神明。授勋仪式已经完成——容器已受到祝福，足以接受命运编织者的旨意。”

languages.text: « Vog, la Première Aube, est tissée dans la tapisserie de votre destin. Haik, la Seconde Aube, est entrée dans les salles préparées pour l'avènement de la Lame de l'Aube. Le nom {mf|du champion|de la championne} est loué par les mortels comme celui {mf|d'un dieu|d'une déesse} en pleine ascension. L'ordination est terminée : le réceptacle est béni et prêt à accepter la volonté du Tisseur. »
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

traits.locale_text: « Vog, la Première Aube, est tissée dans la tapisserie de votre destin. Haik, la Seconde Aube, est entrée dans les salles préparées pour l'avènement de la Lame de l'Aube. Le nom {mf|du champion|de la championne} est loué par les mortels comme celui {mf|d'un dieu|d'une déesse} en pleine ascension. L'ordination est terminée : le réceptacle est béni et prêt à accepter la volonté du Tisseur. »

languages.text: 「第一の黎明、ヴォッグはお前の運命に編みこまれている。第二の黎明、ハイクは暁の刃の到来に備えて用意された殿堂へと入った。英雄の名は甦る神のごとく人々から讃えられる。儀式は終了した。器は祝福され、ウィーヴァーの意志を受け容れる準備は整った」
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

traits.locale_text: 「第一の黎明、ヴォッグはお前の運命に編みこまれている。第二の黎明、ハイクは暁の刃の到来に備えて用意された殿堂へと入った。英雄の名は甦る神のごとく人々から讃えられる。儀式は終了した。器は祝福され、ウィーヴァーの意志を受け容れる準備は整った」

languages.text: «Vog, el Primer Amanecer, está tejido en el tapiz de tu destino. Haik, el Segundo Amanecer, ha entrado en los salones que preparan la llegada del Filo del Amanecer. El nombre de{mf|l| la} campe{mf|ón|ona} es alabado por los mortales como un{mf||a} dios{mf||a} en auge. La ordenación ha terminado: el receptáculo está bendecido y listo para aceptar la voluntad del Tejedor».
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

traits.locale_text: «Vog, el Primer Amanecer, está tejido en el tapiz de tu destino. Haik, el Segundo Amanecer, ha entrado en los salones que preparan la llegada del Filo del Amanecer. El nombre de{mf|l| la} campe{mf|ón|ona} es alabado por los mortales como un{mf||a} dios{mf||a} en auge. La ordenación ha terminado: el receptáculo está bendecido y listo para aceptar la voluntad del Tejedor».

languages.text: "Vog, die Erste Dämmerung, ist in den Teppich Eures Schicksals eingewoben. Haik, die Zweite Dämmerung, hat die Hallen betreten und ist bereit für die Ankunft des Randes des Tagesanbruchs. Der Name des Champions wird von Sterblichen gepriesen wie der eines aufstrebenden Gottes. Die Weihe ist abgeschlossen: Das Gefäß ist gesegnet und bereit, den Willen des Webers anzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."

"Vog, die Erste Dämmerung, ist in den Wandteppich Eures Schicksals eingewebt. Hige, die Zweite Dämmerung, hat die Hallen des Rands des Tagesanbruchs betreten. Der Name des Champions wird von Sterblichen gepriesen wie ein aufstrebender Gott. Die Weihe ist abgeschlossen: Das Gefäß ist gesegnet und bereit, den Willen des Webers anzunehmen."

languages.text: "İlk Şafak Vog, kaderinin ağına örüldü. İkinci Şafak Haik, Tan Vakti'nin gelişini bekleyen salonlara girdi. Müdafinin adı, yükselen bir tanrınınki gibi ölümlülerce şükranla anılıyor. Tertip tamamlandı... Konak kutsandı, Dokuyan'ın iradesini kabul etmeye hazır."
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is woven into the tapestry of your fate. Haik, the Second Dawn, has entered the halls prepared for the coming of the Edge of Daybreak. The champion's name is praised by mortals as that of a rising god. The ordination is complete: the vessel is blessed and ready to accept the Weaver's will."
